trans-unit.source: Job Planning and Processing View

In the Job Planning and Processing view, a significant number of fields are populated with default values from Job Budget Calculation and the work packages (Type and No. of the selected components). Many of these fields were defined in topic <MadCap:xref href="Job Budget Calculation View.htm#_Ref383498728" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Job Budget Calculation View” on page 1</MadCap:xref> and others are defined later in this documentation. Therefore, this section does not provide a complete description of each field.

seg-source.mrk: In the Job Planning and Processing view, a significant number of fields are populated with default values from Job Budget Calculation and the work packages (Type and No.

Many of these fields were defined in topic <MadCap:xref href="Job Budget Calculation View.htm#_Ref383498728" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Job Budget Calculation View” on page 1</MadCap:xref> and others are defined later in this documentation.
Therefore, this section does not provide a complete description of each field.

trans-unit.source: : Job Planning and Processing view for job J000001.01

seg-source.mrk: : Job Planning and Processing view for job J000001.01

Indicates the date on which the procurement process will be finished.

Indicates if the WBS position has been released for procurement processing.

trans-unit.source: Realized % Finalized

Provides the ability to manually overwrite automatic calculated values (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Degree of Completion.htm#_Ref383498927" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Degree of Completion” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

Displays information about variances on calculated values (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Job Controlling.htm#_Ref439669260" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Job Controlling” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Process Channel
Processes are created if the calculation position is linked with a process channel. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Processes are created if the calculation position is linked with a process channel.

trans-unit.source: Work – Processes will be created with Work and Duration.

seg-source.mrk: Work – Processes will be created with Work and Duration.

trans-unit.source: Lead time – Processes are created only with Duration.

seg-source.mrk: Lead time – Processes are created only with Duration.

trans-unit.source: Structure – Processes are created without Work and Duration.

(LCY) of internal procurement (e.g., inventory requests) for the WBS position.

Indicates if the WBS position has been released for shipment processing.

Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Job Liquidity Integration.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Job Liquidity Integration” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information.

trans-unit.source: Team
Indicates if a job team member has been assigned to the WBS position.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates if a job team member has been assigned to the WBS position.

trans-unit.source: Time Entry
Indicates if the WBS position has been released for time entry.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates if the WBS position has been released for time entry.

trans-unit.source: Total Cost Usage (LCY)
Sum of the Total Cost (in local currency) of the posted usage entries in the Job Ledger Entries of the WBS Position.

seg-source.mrk: Sum of the Total Cost (in local currency) of the posted usage entries in the Job Ledger Entries of the WBS Position.

trans-unit.source: Total Cost Usage SP (LCY)
Sum of the Total Cost (in local currency) of the posted usage entries in the Job Ledger Entries assigned to the Sales Position.

seg-source.mrk: Sum of the Total Cost (in local currency) of the posted usage entries in the Job Ledger Entries assigned to the Sales Position.

trans-unit.source: Total Dir. Cost Rem. PO (LCY)
Displays the liability amount (in local currency) of Purchase Orders assigned to the WBS Position.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the liability amount (in local currency) of Purchase Orders assigned to the WBS Position.

trans-unit.source: Total Dir. Cost Usage (LCY)
Sum of the Total Direct Cost (in local currency) of the posted usage entries in the Job Ledger Entries.

seg-source.mrk: Sum of the Total Direct Cost (in local currency) of the posted usage entries in the Job Ledger Entries.

trans-unit.source: TP Liquidity Payment (LCY) / TP Liquidity Request (LCY) / TP Liquidity Schedule (LCY)

seg-source.mrk: TP Liquidity Payment (LCY) / TP Liquidity Request (LCY) / TP Liquidity Schedule (LCY)

trans-unit.source: Total Price fields used with the Job Liquidity module integration in cc|project. Refer to topic “Job Liquidity Integration” on page 1 for more information.

seg-source.mrk: Total Price fields used with the Job Liquidity module integration in cc|project.

Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Job Liquidity Integration.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Job Liquidity Integration” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information.

trans-unit.source: Type
Defaults from the Job Budget Calculation view.

seg-source.mrk: Defaults from the Job Budget Calculation view.

trans-unit.source: Work Planned Hours

Displays the number of hours that have been planned, i.e., resources have been allocated (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Capacity and Resource Planning.htm#_Ref383503173" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Assign Planning Resources” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: Displays the number of hours that have been planned, i.e., resources have been allocated (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Capacity and Resource Planning.htm#_Ref383503173" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Assign Planning Resources” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Actions Tab
The functions on the Actions tab are described in the following sections.

seg-source.mrk: The functions on the Actions tab are described in the following sections.

trans-unit.source: Expand/Collapse
The directory levels can be expanded and collapsed by clicking Actions > Expand/Collapse:

seg-source.mrk: The directory levels can be expanded and collapsed by clicking Actions > Expand/Collapse:

trans-unit.source: Current Position – only relevant on Position lines; expands or collapses depending on the current state, e.g., expanded lines in the Position will be collapsed when the function is run.

seg-source.mrk: Current Position – only relevant on Position lines; expands or collapses depending on the current state, e.g., expanded lines in the Position will be collapsed when the function is run.

trans-unit.source: Expand All – all levels are expanded.

seg-source.mrk: Expand All – all levels are expanded.

trans-unit.source: Collapse All – all levels are collapsed to the Position level.

seg-source.mrk: Collapse All – all levels are collapsed to the Position level.

trans-unit.source: Recalculate Rollup Amounts
This function recalculates the rollup amounts if usage has been posted and the Rollup Type has been changed.

seg-source.mrk: This function recalculates the rollup amounts if usage has been posted and the Rollup Type has been changed.

trans-unit.source: IDS - Connector

This action contains functions that are used when processing job lines with the IDS Webshop interface. Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="IDS Connector.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“IDS Connector” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information.

seg-source.mrk: This action contains functions that are used when processing job lines with the IDS Webshop interface.
Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="IDS Connector.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“IDS Connector” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information.

trans-unit.source: Navigate Tab
The Navigate tab includes four action groups: Line, Planning, Processing and Views. The actions within each are described in the following sections.

seg-source.mrk: The Navigate tab includes four action groups: Line, Planning, Processing and Views.
The actions within each are described in the following sections.

trans-unit.source: Line Action Group
The actions in the Line group are specific to the selected line in the Job Planning and Processing view. Each is described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The actions in the Line group are specific to the selected line in the Job Planning and Processing view.
Each is described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Action
Description
Position Card
Opens the Job Position Card page, which provides a card view of all the information in the Job Planning and Processing view for the selected WBS position.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Job Position Card page, which provides a card view of all the information in the Job Planning and Processing view for the selected WBS position.

trans-unit.source: Dimensions
Opens the Job Line Dimensions page, which displays any dimensions assigned to the job line.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Job Line Dimensions page, which displays any dimensions assigned to the job line.

trans-unit.source: Comments

Job Comments can be added to the Item Card, Service Card and Other Services Card. These comments will then be copied to the appropriate job view when the component is selected in the Job Budget Calculation view. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Job Comments can be added to the Item Card, Service Card and Other Services Card.
These comments will then be copied to the appropriate job view when the component is selected in the Job Budget Calculation view.

trans-unit.source: General
Support
Rough Concept
Procurement
Detailed Concept
Sale
Processing
Long Text
Calculation Schedule
Opens the Job Calc. Schedule Job Line page, which displays calculations for the job line.

seg-source.mrk: Schedule Job Line page, which displays calculations for the job line.

trans-unit.source: Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Entering Information in the.htm#_Ref383442040" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Calculation Schedules” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information.

seg-source.mrk: Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Entering Information in the.htm#_Ref383442040" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Calculation Schedules” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information.

trans-unit.source: Milestone Triggers
Opens the Job Sales Milestone Triggers page, which displays any milestone triggers that have been assigned to the job line.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Job Sales Milestone Triggers page, which displays any milestone triggers that have been assigned to the job line.

trans-unit.source: Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Processing with Milestones.htm#_Ref383442119" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Processing with Milestones” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information.

seg-source.mrk: Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Processing with Milestones.htm#_Ref383442119" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Processing with Milestones” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information.

trans-unit.source: Sales Quote
Opens the related Sales Quote for the line or the Sales List page if multiple quotes exist.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the related Sales Quote for the line or the Sales List page if multiple quotes exist.

trans-unit.source: Sales Order
Opens the related Sales Order for the line or the Sales List page if multiple orders exist.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the related Sales Order for the line or the Sales List page if multiple orders exist.

trans-unit.source: Ledger Entries
Opens the Job Ledger Entries page, displaying all posted entries for the selected line.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Job Ledger Entries page, displaying all posted entries for the selected line.

trans-unit.source: Job Documents
Opens the Job Documents page, which displays all documents relating to the selected line.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Job Documents page, which displays all documents relating to the selected line.

trans-unit.source: Change Log Entries
Opens the Change Log Entries page, which displays changes made to the selected job line.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Change Log Entries page, which displays changes made to the selected job line.

trans-unit.source: Item Tracking Lines
Opens the Lot- or Serial No. List page (depending on the type of item tracking), which displays all item tracking lines for the selected line.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Lot- or Serial No.
List page (depending on the type of item tracking), which displays all item tracking lines for the selected line.

trans-unit.source: Liquidity Entries
Used with the Job Liquidity module integration in cc|project. Refer to topic “Job Liquidity Integration” on page 1 for more information.

seg-source.mrk: Used with the Job Liquidity module integration in cc|project.

Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Job Liquidity Integration.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Job Liquidity Integration” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information.

trans-unit.source: Planning Action Group
The Planning group provides various setup and process pages relating to planning. Each is described in this section.

seg-source.mrk: The Planning group provides various setup and process pages relating to planning.
Each is described in this section.

trans-unit.source: Action
Description
Planning Setup
Opens the Job Planning Setup page, which is defaulted from Standard Planning Setup and can be changed for individual Job planning parameters.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Job Planning Setup page, which is defaulted from Standard Planning Setup and can be changed for individual Job planning parameters.

trans-unit.source: Planning Process
Contains actions related to planning processing. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Contains actions related to planning processing.

trans-unit.source: Planning – plans a WBS position for planning processing.

seg-source.mrk: Planning – plans a WBS position for planning processing.

trans-unit.source: Release – releases a planned WBS position for planning processing.

seg-source.mrk: Release – releases a planned WBS position for planning processing.

trans-unit.source: Planning and Release – plans and releases the WBS position(s) concurrently.

seg-source.mrk: Planning and Release – plans and releases the WBS position(s) concurrently.

trans-unit.source: Set to “Finished” – sets the Planning Status = Finished.

seg-source.mrk: Set to “Finished” – sets the Planning Status = Finished.

trans-unit.source: View
Opens the Planning Processes page, where the WBS positions can be viewed. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Planning Processes page, where the WBS positions can be viewed.

trans-unit.source: Per Line – Only planning processes for the selected line are displayed.

seg-source.mrk: Per Line – Only planning processes for the selected line are displayed.

trans-unit.source: Per Block – All planning processes for the main position are displayed.

seg-source.mrk: Per Block – All planning processes for the main position are displayed.

trans-unit.source: Resource Allocation
Opens the Planning Res. Allocation page, where resources can be assigned to WBS planning positions (refer to topic “Resource Allocation” on page 1).

seg-source.mrk: Allocation page, where resources can be assigned to WBS planning positions (refer to topic “Resource Allocation” on page 1).

trans-unit.source: Processing Action Group
The Processing group provides various setup and process pages relating to processing. Each is described in this section.

seg-source.mrk: The Processing group provides various setup and process pages relating to processing.
Each is described in this section.

trans-unit.source: Action
Description
Procurement
Contains actions related to procurement processing. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Contains actions related to procurement processing.

trans-unit.source: Planning – plans a WBS position for procurement processing.

seg-source.mrk: Planning – plans a WBS position for procurement processing.

trans-unit.source: Release – releases a planned WBS position for procurement processing.

seg-source.mrk: Release – releases a planned WBS position for procurement processing.

trans-unit.source: Planning and Release – plans and releases the WBS position(s) concurrently.

seg-source.mrk: Planning and Release – plans and releases the WBS position(s) concurrently.

trans-unit.source: Set Finished – sets the Procurement Status = Finished.

seg-source.mrk: Set Finished – sets the Procurement Status = Finished.

trans-unit.source: Shipment
Contains actions related to shipment processing. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Contains actions related to shipment processing.

trans-unit.source: Planning – plans a WBS position for shipment processing.

seg-source.mrk: Planning – plans a WBS position for shipment processing.

trans-unit.source: Release – releases a planned WBS position for shipment processing.

seg-source.mrk: Release – releases a planned WBS position for shipment processing.

trans-unit.source: Planning and Release – plans and releases the WBS position(s) concurrently.

seg-source.mrk: Planning and Release – plans and releases the WBS position(s) concurrently.

trans-unit.source: Set Finished – sets the Shipment Status = Finished.

seg-source.mrk: Set Finished – sets the Shipment Status = Finished.

trans-unit.source: Invoicing
Contains the Planning action for invoice processing, which plans a WBS position for invoice processing.

seg-source.mrk: Contains the Planning action for invoice processing, which plans a WBS position for invoice processing.

trans-unit.source: Controlling

Contains the Signal Monitor action for job controlling information (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Signal Monitor.htm#_Ref383450973" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Signal Monitor” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: Contains the Signal Monitor action for job controlling information (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Signal Monitor.htm#_Ref383450973" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Signal Monitor” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Views Action Group
The Views group provides direct access to the other views relating to the job. Each is described in this section.

seg-source.mrk: The Views group provides direct access to the other views relating to the job.
Each is described in this section.

trans-unit.source: Action
Description
Budget Calculation

Opens the Job Budget Calculation view, which is used to create the job structure and calculation, and is the basis for creating a job offer. Refer to topic “Calculation and Budgeting” on page 1 for more information.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Job Budget Calculation view, which is used to create the job structure and calculation, and is the basis for creating a job offer.

Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Calculation and Budgeting.htm#_Ref437620558" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Calculation and Budgeting” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information.

trans-unit.source: Detailed Planning
Opens the Job Budget Calculation view only for calculation lines set with Budget = Yes.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Job Budget Calculation view only for calculation lines set with Budget = Yes.

trans-unit.source: Sale

Opens the Job Budget Sales view, which shows only sales positions that are associated with a Sales Code. This view is used to review and initialize invoicing. Refer to topic “Job Processing” on page 1 for more information.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Job Budget Sales view, which shows only sales positions that are associated with a Sales Code.
This view is used to review and initialize invoicing.
Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Job Processing.htm#_Ref439670631" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Job Processing” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information.

trans-unit.source: Rolling Calculation
Opens the Job Rolling Calculation view, which includes the most important sums during a job cycle. It is used for permanent job controlling.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Job Rolling Calculation view, which includes the most important sums during a job cycle.
It is used for permanent job controlling.

trans-unit.source: Procurement
Provides different procurement information for the WBS positions. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Provides different procurement information for the WBS positions.

trans-unit.source: Per Line – Opens the Planning Processes page, where only procurement processes for the selected line are displayed.

seg-source.mrk: Per Line – Opens the Planning Processes page, where only procurement processes for the selected line are displayed.

trans-unit.source: Per Block – Opens the Planning Processes page, where all procurement processes for the main position are displayed.

seg-source.mrk: Per Block – Opens the Planning Processes page, where all procurement processes for the main position are displayed.

trans-unit.source: Processing Documents – Opens non-posted procurement documents.

seg-source.mrk: Processing Documents – Opens non-posted procurement documents.

trans-unit.source: Shipment
Provides different shipment information for the WBS positions. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Provides different shipment information for the WBS positions.

trans-unit.source: Per Line – Opens the Planning Processes page, where only shipment processes for the selected line are displayed.

seg-source.mrk: Per Line – Opens the Planning Processes page, where only shipment processes for the selected line are displayed.

trans-unit.source: Per Block – Opens the Planning Processes page, where all shipment processes for the main position are displayed.

seg-source.mrk: Per Block – Opens the Planning Processes page, where all shipment processes for the main position are displayed.

trans-unit.source: Job Shipment – Opens non-posted Job Shipment documents.

seg-source.mrk: Job Shipment – Opens non-posted Job Shipment documents.

trans-unit.source: Posted Job Shipment – Opens posted Job Shipment documents.

seg-source.mrk: Posted Job Shipment – Opens posted Job Shipment documents.

trans-unit.source: Invoicing
Opens the Planning Processes page, where the WBS positions can be viewed. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Opens the Planning Processes page, where the WBS positions can be viewed.

trans-unit.source: Per Line – Only invoicing processes for the selected line are displayed.

seg-source.mrk: Per Line – Only invoicing processes for the selected line are displayed.

trans-unit.source: Per Block – All invoicing processes for the main position are displayed.

seg-source.mrk: Per Block – All invoicing processes for the main position are displayed.

trans-unit.source: FactBoxes
The Job Planning and Processing view includes two cc|project-specific FactBoxes:

seg-source.mrk: The Job Planning and Processing view includes two cc|project-specific FactBoxes:

trans-unit.source: WBS Processing – displays planning, procurement, job shipment and invoicing information about the job planning line.

seg-source.mrk: WBS Processing – displays planning, procurement, job shipment and invoicing information about the job planning line.

trans-unit.source: Job Comment Lines – displays all comments assigned to the planning and processing line.

seg-source.mrk: Job Comment Lines – displays all comments assigned to the planning and processing line.
